programOverview.title: Lab2Market Prairies
programOverview.description: Lab2Market bridges the gap between a research idea and commercialization. Participants who complete the Lab2Market program are rewarded with critical entrepreneurial skills and $10,000 (through Mitacs and PrairiesCan) to help fund their research. This program encourages researchers to challenge their lab findings and test whether there is a need for their innovation in the commercial market.
programOverview.welcomeMessage: Hello and welcome! (We’re glad you’re here.) Our team is thrilled to delivering Cohort 7 of Lab2Market Prairies / Validate—we look forward to collaborating with you all and empowering you throughout this program and beyond!
